title.zh: 丰城：血友病女性家属关爱检测公益活动
title.en: Fengcheng: Hemophilia Female Family Members Care Testing Charity Activity

subtitle.zh: 携带者检测援助项目持续推进
subtitle.en: Carrier Testing Assistance Project Continues to Advance

description.zh: 南昌血之友公益协会赴丰城市开展血友病女性家属关爱检测公益活动，延续「携带者检测援助」项目，帮助7名女性做凝血检测。这次活动进一步将关爱服务延伸到丰城地区，体现了项目在江西省内各地市的全面覆盖，让更多基层地区的女性能够就近享受到专业的检测服务和健康关爱。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association went to Fengcheng City to conduct charity testing activities for female family members of hemophilia patients, continuing the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project and helping 7 women with coagulation testing. This activity further extended care services to the Fengcheng area, reflecting the project's comprehensive coverage across various cities in Jiangxi Province, allowing more women in grassroots areas to enjoy professional testing services and health care nearby.

title.zh: 微信公众号：丰城检测活动报道
